name: Invasive Broodfish
text:
{1}{G}, {t}: Create a 1/1 green Fish creature token.
Flood {2}{b}{g} ({2}{b}{g}, Exile this card from your hand: Target land loses all land types and abilities and has "{T}: Add {c}." Flood only as a sorcery.) 
Whenever you flood Invasive Broodfish, that land gains "Whenever this land becomes tapped, each opponent creates a 1/1 green Fish creature token."
